FrageText.en: What does the term "even days" mean?

de.Text: Das sind z.B. der 2., 4., 6.. Tag eines Monats
Das sind alle Dienstage, Donnerstage und Samstage einer Woche
Das sind alle Montage, Mittwoche und Freitage eines Monats
Das sind alle Tage einer Woche außer Samstag und Sonntag

en.Text: They are, for example, the 2., 4., 6.. day of a month
They are the Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday of a given week
They are all the Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays of a given month
They are all the days of a week except Saturday and Sunday

hr.Text: To su svi utorci, četvrtci i subote u tjednu
To su svi ponedjeljci, srijede i petci u mjesecu
To su svi dani u tjednu osim subote i nedjelje

sl.Text: To so n.p. 2.,4.,6.. dan v mesecu
To so vsi torki, četrtki in sobote enega tedna
To so vsi ponedeljki, srede in petki enega meseca
To so vsi dnevi enega tedna razen sobote in nedelje

tr.Text: Haftanın bütün salı, perşembe, cumartesi günleri
Ayın bütün pazartesi, çarşamba, cuma günleri
Haftanın cumartesi ve pazar dışındaki bütün günleri
